title: SQL Formatter

instructions.title: How to use SQL Formatter

steps.title: Paste your SQL query
steps.description: Copy and paste your SQL query into the input area. The tool accepts any format and will process it immediately.

steps.title: Configure options (if available)
steps.description: Adjust formatting options, indentation, or other settings to match your preferences and coding standards.

steps.title: Review the output
steps.description: The tool will format and beautify your input and display the result with proper formatting and validation.

steps.title: Copy or download result
steps.description: Copy the formatted SQL to your clipboard for immediate use or download it as a file for storage and sharing.

meta.title: SQL Formatter - Free Online Tool

pageDescription: Format and beautify SQL queries with proper indentation, keyword highlighting, and syntax validation. Perfect for database developers, data analysts, and SQL optimization.
